code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import axios from'axios';var initialState={gazeteler:[],specific:[],updateEl:{_id:'',user:'',title:'',description:'',owner:'',name:'',date:new Date()},message:'',completed:false,errors:{}};export var gazetelerSlice=createSlice({name:'gazeteler',initialState:initialState,reducers:{setInitial:function setInitial(state){state.completed=false;state.message='';state.errors={};state.updateEl={_id:'',user:'',title:'',description:'',owner:'',name:'',date:new Date()};},setGazeteler:function setGazeteler(state,action){state.gazeteler=action.payload;state.completed=true;},setSpecificNews:function setSpecificNews(state,action){state.specific=action.payload;state.completed=true;},setDataFailed:function setDataFailed(state,action){state.errors=action.payload;state.completed=false;},setUpdateEl:function setUpdateEl(state,action){state.updateEl=state.specific.find(function(item){return item._id===action.payload;});}}});var _gazetelerSlice$actio=gazetelerSlice.actions,setInitial=_gazetelerSlice$actio.setInitial,setDataFailed=_gazetelerSlice$actio.setDataFailed,setUpdateEl=_gazetelerSlice$actio.setUpdateEl,setGazeteler=_gazetelerSlice$actio.setGazeteler,setSpecificNews=_gazetelerSlice$actio.setSpecificNews;export{setInitial,setDataFailed,setUpdateEl,setGazeteler,setSpecificNews};export var getGazeteler=function getGazeteler(date){return function(dispatch){axios.get("http://localhost:5000/api/gazeteler?date=".concat(date)).then(function(res){dispatch(setGazeteler(res.data));dispatch(setSpecificNews(res.data));}).catch(function(err){dispatch(setDataFailed(err));});};};export var setGazetelerToDatabase=function setGazetelerToDatabase(data,date){return function(dispatch){var token=localStorage.getItem('token');axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/gazeteler/create',data,{headers:{"Authorization":"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(res){dispatch(getGazeteler(date));dispatch(setInitial());}).catch(function(err){dispatch(setDataFailed(err.response.data));});};};export var deleteGazeteler=function deleteGazeteler(id,date){return function(dispatch){var token=localStorage.getItem('token');axios.delete("http://localhost:5000/api/gazeteler/delete/".concat(id),{headers:{"Authorization":"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(res){dispatch(getGazeteler(date));}).catch(function(err){dispatch(setDataFailed(err));});};};export var updateGazeteler=function updateGazeteler(id,data,date){return function(dispatch){var token=localStorage.getItem('token');axios.put("http://localhost:5000/api/gazeteler/update/".concat(id),data,{headers:{"Authorization":"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(res){dispatch(getGazeteler(date));dispatch(setInitial());}).catch(function(err){dispatch(setDataFailed(err.response.data));});};};export var stateVeri=function stateVeri(state){return state.gazeteler.gazeteler;};export var stateUpdateEl=function stateUpdateEl(state){return state.gazeteler.updateEl;};export var stateErrors=function stateErrors(state){return state.gazeteler.errors;};export var stateCompleted=function stateCompleted(state){return state.gazeteler.completed;};export var stateSpecificNews=function stateSpecificNews(state){return state.gazeteler.specific;};export default gazetelerSlice.reducer;
